title: RADS error cannot connect to HTTP Server
body: so i have been around since league was a baby and have never had a problem, i had not played for a fair while and decided to jump back on but i can't even launch the patcher client? i have tried many things already and nothing is working all firewalls and anti virus are temporarily turned off still nothing. this is the first time i have encountered this problem ever any help guys?

replies.body:
1. Right click on your connection icon in the bottom right of your screen.
2. Go to the network centre. 
3. Go to the adapter settings thingie.
4. Search your connection.
5. Right click -> properties.
6. Search Internet protocol version 4.
7. Right click -> properties.
8. Change your DNS servers to 8.8.4.4 (the first one) and 8.8.8.8 (the second one).
Stop posting this garbage like a parrot, it does not period. Noobs think we are illiterate and have not tried any solutions yet. For the Love of Almighty Jesus Christ think before you post.
so it has been a few days now and nothing has fixed the RADS error still cannot launch the patcher? should i just not come back to this game even though i have been around since the start? sigh....
